steps.goal: Open the URL https://github.com/notifications in the browser using open_url action. Wait for the page to load. Use read_screen to collect all notification titles and their repositories. Copy the summary to clipboard.

Open the GitHub app. Go to the Pull Requests section (it may be under the Notifications or Home tab). Use read_screen to collect all open PRs assigned to me or requesting my review. Copy the list to clipboard.
